run_pipeline: Compute locomotive tasks and show chronograms
intro_text:
Welcome to this application for analyzing locomotor actions in Manual Wheelchairs (MWC). This application allows you to:

  • Determine the linear and angular speeds of the MWC from inertial measurement unit data.
  • Automatically identify locomotor tasks by customizing the thresholds used.
  • Visualize the results in clear, simplified chronograms.
  • Export the results in CSV format for further processing.

Before getting started, it is important to:

  • Carefully read the file loading instructions (Help button at the top right).
  • Ensure that the recorded data is complete, as incomplete data is not handled by this application.
  • Understand how the processing works and the meaning of the chronograms by reading the help section or the publication associated with this work (at the bottom of the page).

Once you have reviewed all this information, use the buttons below to navigate through the application.
